Deal with arrogant people

We hate the arrogant folks. They are judgmental and often derogatory. I am all for ignoring them at will. But at times, they deserve a response, so there is a way to do that by emanating positivity (for yourself) and a pinch of confidence.

Next time you meet one, here’s what you say:

We will meet again, and when we do, things will be different.

It fills us with confidence and keeps our feet on ground. Read the detailed article here.

In Over Your Head is an excellent web resource for developing a very electric personality and building a character. I personally recommend the site and their articles.

Published on October 22, 2013.

Epilogue

Thanks for reading the article! There's plenty more to read if you liked this one. My company also develops Octalbonescript and has open-sourced it. My work/interest aligns towards jQuery, Node.js, AJAX, AngularJS, front-end web-development and software-hardware system design.

For any questions on open-source hardware, software development and any other projects, reach out on hardik@hardik.org or tweet (@hvpandya) me.
